help.title: ${commands.help.title}
help.description:
>>> **WARN!** Optional argument is **`[]`**
**WARN!** Required argument is **`<>`**

**WARN!** For more help with commands **type `%shelp [command]`**
help.anti-spam-warns.description: **WARN!** Set a default warn count for ban spammers while join to server.
help.prefix.args:
${new_prefix}
WARN! should be larger than 1 and less than 8 symbols
security-info.title: ${server.securitysettings}
warns.title: **WARN!** Checking a user for spam
warns.count_me:
let your_warns_count = %s
**WARN!** You can appeal your activity: **[sqdsh.top/bot_warn_appeal](https://sqdsh.top/bot_warn_appeal)**
lyrics.title: ${title}
lyrics.words.name: ${track.name}
ping.title: ${ping.title}
about.title: **WARN!** Who I'M?
error.title: **Error:** %s An error has occurred!
error.description.spamMode:
**Error:** On server `%s` enabled anti-invite mode.
**Warn!**You have **%s/10 warns**. Stop now, until it's not too late!
error.description.spamMode.banned:
**Error:** On server **%s** enabled anti-spam mode.
**Warn!** Since you have **%s/%s warns**
**Warn!** You automatically a banned on this server.
**Warn!** If you think that your activity was absolutely legal - fill out this form: https://sqdsh.top/bot_warn_appeal
error.description.spamMode.force_banned:
**Error:** On server **%s** enabled anti-spam mode.
**Warn!** You are blacklisted for a reason `%s
**Warn!** You automatically a banned on this server.
**Warn!** If you think that your activity was absolutely legal - fill out this form: https://sqdsh.top/bot_warn_appeal
error.description.reason.spamMode: **Error:** Spam on this or other servers
error.description.anti_invite: **Error:** On this server send invite links is forbidden.
error.description.anti_monitoring: **Error:** This server is protected against links to bad monitoring servers/bots.
error.description.no_prefix: **TypeError:** Prefix cannot contain more than 8 characters.
error.description.no_color:
**TypeError:** HEX-code is not provided, or HEX-code was incorrect.

> Maybe you forget type `#` to the beginning of the command.
> You can pick a color in this website: **[`www.color-hex.com`](https://www.color-hex.com)**
error.description.cooldown:
**Error:** This command has a cooldown.!
> Try again in **%s**
error.description.stack_song_error: **Error:** An unexpected error has occurred during song playing!
error.play.description.not_connected: **Error:** You must be in voice channel for command execution.
error.play.description.not_connected_to_: **Error:** You must be in voice channel with me.
error.play.description.no_args: **TypeError:** Please, type a name or video URL from Youtube.
play.title: ${music}
play.description.playlist: **WARN!** %s All tracks from playlist **%s** added to queue!
play.description.added: **WARN!** %s Track with name **%s** added to queue!
push.play.quit-from-voice: **WARN!** All members leave from voice channel, bot too.
